email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,500MT, and the incoterm is CFR. The vessel, OCEAN HORIZON, has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225m. The starting freight quote is USD 28 per MT. Let me know if you're interested.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you provide more details on the laycan and the demurrage rate? Also, is there any flexibility in the freight rate?

Best regards,
Elena Rodriguez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

The laycan is 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day. Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 26 per MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

USD 26 per MT is more reasonable. Can you confirm the loading window and the demurrage rate? Also, please provide the vessel's draft and any additional details that might be relevant.

Best regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is confirmed at USD 10,000 per day. The vessel's draft is 14.5m. Let me know if you need any further details or if we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Everything looks good. Let's proceed with the booking at USD 26 per MT. Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

Great! I've attached the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Liam
